name: Weathergage Capital
overview:
Weathergage Capital is an investment firm formed in 2006 specializing in identifying and accessing private equity partnerships which we believe have the potential to produce extraordinary returns.

As a fund of funds, Weathergage seeks to provide its limited partners with meaningful exposure to funds managed by top tier venture capital firms, with an emphasis on established venture groups, plus newer initiatives launched by proven investors. These venture capitalists - and in particular, the entrepreneurs they have sponsored - have harnessed many of the disruptive innovations that characterize the venture industry and that ultimately have produced outstanding investment returns over time.
